Row.Text: You stand before Mandukhai Khatun, the descendant of Genghis Khan and the reunifier of his peoples. What accomplishments can you boast of?
Tem√ºjin, is that you? I am Mandukhai, a descendant of yours, and it has long been my ambition to match your accomplishments.
Impossible! It must have been sabotage... how else could I have failed?
As much as it pains me to have failed, it was still an honor to witness you in battle.
Fool! You have just initiated your own annihilation.
Typically I prefer to unify by conquest, but you are the rare leader who may actually be my equal. Let us make a public Declaration of Friendship, and watch the world tremble.
You are a worm, lower than a worm, and I relish the idea of crushing you. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
It is time that your people fall under my dominion.
I am no longer impressed by you. Your leadership has become outmoded, and the Mongols shall now bow to me.
You've been expanding quite a bit lately... your new settlements look ripe for conquest.
Come to beg for a reprieve?
Greetings, friend! When I heard it was you, I had to ride out from the city to see.
What brings you to my court today?
I see you still think yourself worthy of my presence. State your case quickly and then begone.
You have been flaunting your military lately. Is this a challenge?
What do you have to offer to me?
An embarrassing showing by my generals... I will have them replaced and come back stronger.
The Mongol peoples demand your goods, but I think it is best to acquire them peacefully for now. Shall we trade?
I cannot rest until your destruction is complete.
My people are going to be traveling through your lands. I trust you will allow them to do so peacefully.
Your pathetic offerings insult me.
The Mongols are a proud people, but even so, we must sometimes admit weakness. Is it within your power to assist us?
Pathetic. I have made a mistake in tolerating you this long.
Are you a coward? Do you fear the heat of battle?
A great triumph for the Mongols. Now, what laws shall I impose on your people...?
